paper_abstract: Blogs are tools that put web publication into the layman's hands. Despite its simplicity, the publication process is a cumbersome task when the content to be published is already in desktop documents. In order to ease this process, we have created Blogouse, a user-friendly, editor-independent, and blog-independent publication tool, which applies annotation techniques to the publication system. To attain this aim, we have extended the mouse device functionality to be ontology-aware.
paper_title: Blogouse: Turning the mouse into a copy&blog device
